          <title>
            <string language="ca">Comparatius</string>
            <string language="en">The comparative</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Komparativ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le comparatif</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O comparativo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il comparativo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο συγκριτικός</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Pregunta amb resposta (PAR) sobre les comparacions en què s'explica l'ús del "more" i de l'"-er".</string>
            <string language="en">Question and answer (PAR) on comparatives with 'more' and '-er'.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">gramàtica</string>
            <string language="en">grammar</string>
            <string language="es">gramática</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fragen Sie und antworten Sie (GLEICHHEIT) auf 
Komparativen mit ' mehr ' und ' - äh '.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Interrogez et répondez (PAIR) sur des comparatifs
avec 'plus 'et '- heu '.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Questione e responda (PAR) em comparativos com ' 
mais ' e ' - er '.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Domanda e risponda a (PAR) sui comparativi con 
'più 'e '- er '.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ερωταποκρίσεις (ΙΣΟΤΙΜΙΑ) στα comparatives με 
"περισσότερουσ" και "- ER".</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grammatik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">grammaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-it">grammatica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
